text: Futhi labo abangakholwanga, imisebenzi yabo injengenkohliso yasogwadule lapho kuvela emehlweni omuntu ohambayo okungathi amachibi amanzi kube kungekho lutho, onxaniwe ucabanga ukuthi ngamanzi kuze kube yilapho uma efika eduze kwayo (inkohliso) angatholi lutho kepha athole uMvelinqangi ekanye naye bese emkhokhela okungokwakhe futhi uMvelinqangi uyashesha ekwahluleleni
